analysis.key_quote: This new proposed rule, moving tens of thousands of neutral government positions into at-will positions without civil service protections, would place additional pressure on federal employees to comply with illegal Presidential directives by threatening their jobs.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization of the civil service, loss of employee protections, and the potential negative impact on skilled federal workers. It emphasizes the importance of maintaining a merit-based system and due process for employees.
